name: World PK Soccer
overview:
World PK Soccer is an electronic soccer game that simulated a penalty kick. This "simulation" was possible by the unique structure that the arcade machine had, since it carried a ball-shaped object that was to be kicked by the player, to measure the force of his kick in a penalty shootout. The goal, however, was, of course, to score a goal.

The game was released by the producer Jaleco in 1994. In 1996, the game gained a second version, titled World PK Soccer V2.
